short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick fix so that the search bar stays at top during scroll

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This light weight extensions make the google search bar (the grey one) stay at the top no matter how far down you scroll. I don't even understand why this isn't already part of the site.
